title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - EA 7 Edgley Optica - Version 2.1 released
description:
In this how to we are going to look at the EA-7 Edgley Optica aircraft. The aircraft has received a nice update which now allows you to land on snow but probably the most important thing is that it is not compatible with Sim Update 5.

If you want to give the aircraft a try yourself you can download it from the site below: 
https://flightsim.to/file/12731/ea-7-edgley-optica

Keep in mind that if you want to use it with the GTN750 you will need to download a copy from it from the site below:
https://pms50.com/msfs/

Keep in mind that the basic version has limited functionalities. To have the full suite of functionalities you need to buy a subscription.
